name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Meet Translation and AI Note Taker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JotMe automatically translates between 77+ languages, generates transcripts, and writes AI meeting notes on Google Meet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can get started in under 30 seconds by signing up without credit card details! 

➤ With JotMe you can get:
- Real-time translation and transcription on Google Meet.
- Transcript with translation side by side after meetings.
- AI meeting notes with a gist and summary that contains “action items” and “key points”.

➤ How to use it
1. Add this extension to your Chrome Browser.
2. Sign-up to create an account.
3. Start your Google Meet.
4. Set language. 
5. To access transcripts and AI meeting notes use JotMe extension popup, go to app.jotme.io, or sign-in from jotme.io. 
*visual guidance is at: https://www.jotme.io/#how-to

➤ Available Language
There are 77 languages available for you: English, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Swedish, Finnish, Arabic, Hindi, Urdu, Turkish, Norwegian, Italian, Burmese, Russian, Filipino, Swahili, Hungarian and more: https://www.jotme.io/translation-transcription-meeting-notes-languages

➤ Terms and Conditions
By downloading the JotMe Chrome extension, you consent to the processing of live captions from your Google Meet sessions. This data will be utilized exclusively for enhancing our AI-driven services. We are committed to continuous improvement and value your contribution to this process. Additionally, as our service involves collecting speech through live captions, you are required to obtain consent from all participants in your meetings before using JotMe. It is your responsibility to ensure that all parties know that our extension may capture and process their speech.

➤ Notes from the makers
JotMe aspires to be an AI assistant that does your work at a multilingual workplace where the language barrier can be a big issue. Try it today! It is free and no credit card required. More importantly, let us know what you think after you try it!
